ing: 1 teaspoon unseasoned meat tenderizer (such as Adolph'sÂ®)
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
n: Slow Baked Beef Brisket with Gravy
des: "Unbelievably easy and incredibly flavorful brisket and gravy.  Put in the oven for 4-5 hours and forget about it! Pair with mashed potatoes and sauteed green beans for a dinner that will get rave reviews. (Store leftovers in gravy and add new sides to make it last for 2 dinners!)"
ins:
Preheat an oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). Season the beef brisket with garlic salt and meat tenderizer, and place in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Mix the beef gravy, Italian salad dressing, mushrooms, and onion soup mix in a bowl. Pour mixture over the beef brisket. Cover tightly with aluminum foil.
Bake in the preheated oven until very tender, 4 to 5 hours.
